repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits

summary.p: The 6th Kāṇṭam, that is, the Yuttakāṇṭam, of the Tamil version of the Rāmāyaṇa by Kampaṉ.
The present description is summary as the bundle is too fragile to allow an exhaustive examination.
Description based on the examination of the original manuscript (March 2022).
Dimensions assessed at the time of examination.

msItem.title: Kamparāmāyaṇam: TBC, Colophon & Table of Contents

extent.note: Some folios are smaller, e.g. U3, f105 (365 x 35 mm).

collation.desc: the front cover. Sticker on recto.
1 folio = front guard leaf. No foliation. Recto blank. 1 unfinished line, unblackened, on the verso = fragment of Kamparāmāyaṇam, stanza 9342.
1 folio = Kamparāmāyaṇam: TBC, Colophon (recto) and Table of Contents (verso). No foliation.

373 folios = Kamparāmāyaṇam, Yuttakāṇṭam: Mūlam. Tamil foliation [1], [1], 3, [1-9], 12-13, [1-2], 20-41, [1-3], 46-54, 60-93, [1], 94-223, 225-3711, 3712-401. Many folios with lost foliation. 415 x 30 mm.
1 folio = back guard leaf. No foliation. Double leaf. Blank recto verso.
the back cover. BnF shelfmark sticker on verso.

additions.desc:
Note on a small paper written in blue ballpen:
Rāmāyaṇa en tamoul
Yuddhakaṇḍa
(intitulé fol. 1.a marge:
uyittakaṇḍam)

Sticker written in black pencil (line 1) and black ink (lines 1-5) (front cover, recto):
mai 1774 12 9bre [i.e. septembre] 1860this line by hand #1
N°3.
contenant ouïttacan
dam
3e partiethese 4 lines by hand #2
BnF shelfmark sticker: INDIEN 951 (back cover, recto).
List of chapters (entitled Aṭṭavaṇai; 6 columns): chapter's name, total stanzas per chapter; total chapters (paṭalam), overall total stanzas (viruttam), overall total leaves (ēṭu).
Left-marginal intertitles, e.g.: f1r, f15r, f77r, f86r, f88v, f92r, f142r, f151r, f172r, f196r, f230r, f242r, f269r, f284r, f330r, f353r, f3712r, f390r, f396r. See selection below.

binding.p: Original wood covers. With a woodstick tied to the string and threaded in one of the holes. Sticker on front cover, recto. 415 x 35 mm.

origin.origDate: Internally dated to the year nantaṉa of the Jovian cycle, that is, CE 1832-1833, 1772-1773, 1712-1713, etc. (see copy beginning statement and colophon, U2, f[1]r4) and dated to the year jaya of the Jovian cycle, that is, CE 1834-1835, 1774-1775, 1714-1715, etc (see colophon, U3, f401v2). See sticker on front cover, recto for the correponding CE date = 1774.

provenance.p: Owned / Borrowed by Julien Vinson (1843-1926). See handwritten addition to Cabaton (1912), f3r, no. 951 to Cabaton (1912).

acquisition.p: Acquired, June 20th, 1930, from Paul Vinson. See BnF, département des Manuscrits, inventaire 3 = Acquisitions: manuscrits et imprimés documentaires, 1894-1950, no. 13591.

listBibl.bibl: Cabaton, Antoine. 1912. Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits indiens, indo-chinois & malayo-polynésiens. Bibliothèque nationale. Département des manuscrits. Paris: E. Leroux. — See handwritten addition, f3r, no. 951.

encodingDesc.p: General ― Unmarked length of ō and ē supplied. Unmarked puḷḷi supplied. Conjectural reading (text unclear) between parentheses. Supplied reading (text lost) between square brackets. Alternative readings separated by slash. In transliteration ― Unmarked elided overshort u supplied as an apostrophe. Uppercase for initial vowels. Symbols between curly brackets. Abbreviations ― c = column; f = folio; lf = library foliation; lm = left margin; r = recto; rm = right margin; u / U followed by a number = unit (codicological and/or textual); v = verso.

revisionDesc.change: Revised by Emmanuel FRANCIS. Version 1, June 2022.

m
stanza 6186
śrīrāmaṉ tuṇai
Irāvaṇaṉ mantirappaṭalam
24 Ilaṅkai kāṇ paṭalam muttum śubham astu
Irāvaṇaṉ tālai kāṇ paṭalam
tiruppaṭalamuttum śrīmaṉ-ṉārāyaṇar kiṟupai y-uṇṭāka
viṭai koṭutta paṭalam
kāttā
ṉ amparatt’ aṉantar nīkki y-ayōtti vantiṟutta kālaistanza 10132
viṭaikoṭutta paṭalamuṟṟum śrīmaṉ-ṉārāyaṇar kiṟupai y-uṇṭāka vēṇum śrīmatti-rāmāyaṇaM
ceya varuṣam vaikāci mācam 27 cōmavāramum pañcamiyuṅ kūṭiṉa puṇṇiyatiṉattilē śrīmatti-rāmāyaṇam y-eḻuti mu
kintatu hari Om
end of line 3 and lines 4-6 unblackened = later addition Inta rāmāyaṇam eḻutiṉatu koṭṭu cēriyil irukku muttuk kumāra
Upāttiyārum avar kumāraṉ cuppiṟāmaṇiyaṉ iruvarum inta rāmāyaṇaM Ārātilum vāṅkip paṭittāl
maṟupaṭi Avar kaiyilk koṭuttu viṭa vēṇṭiyatu koṭāmal iruntālt toḻum varum
Ippaṭikku śrīrāmaṉ aruḷic ceytatu Itu nilavāmal yeṇṇavum Inta vicēṣattai
